splash_content.title: DISCOVER THE BEST FEATURE OF THIS RELEASE

articles.title: 🔥 Follow-up emails priority
articles.desc: You can now set a high priority for follow-up emails, to make sure they are sent first when a big campaign is currently being sent.

articles.title: 🧩 EventBooking: Custom view date format
articles.desc: With EventBooking when you edit the custom view, the dates displayed are in the same format and you can now choose to display more dates.

articles.title: 🧩 Fixes for add-ons
articles.desc: We fixed an error on the insertion of Event Booking, RSEvents Pro and Seblod content in emails for Joomla 3.

articles.title: 🧩 HikaShop: Cart reminder filter
articles.desc: The HikaShop filter for cart reminder has been changed to only allow a number of days, as it was originally intended.

articles.title: 🧩 HikaShop: coupons
articles.desc: The coupon codes generated by AcyMailing were not shown correctly inside emails when they started with a number.

articles.title: 🧩 Joomla 5 code API
articles.desc: We fixed an issue on Joomla 5 when trying to load translations, when using the AcyMailing code API.

articles.title: 🧩 The Events Calendar: Sorting events by date
articles.desc: Sorting events by date when inserting them by category in a newsletter now works correctly with The Events Calendar.

articles.title: 🎁 Sending service: automation emails
articles.desc: The emails sent from an automation do not require an unsubscribe link anymore with our sending service.

articles.title: 🎁 Sending service: CNAME verification
articles.desc: The CNAME verification for the sending service now recognizes the new entries format.

articles.title: 🎁 Fixes for the fail statistics
articles.desc: The way the fail statistics are collected has been improved to avoid counting the same email twice in some cases.

articles.title: 🎁 Automatic campaigns starting date
articles.desc: The starting date of an automated campaign can now correctly be modified when using a language other than English.
